channel.title: dev ops on ivy (likethevine)

item.title: Dev Ops are not Optional.
item.description: We want to automate as much as possible! <a href='https://www.ta-systems.com/system-categories/automated-assembly-lines/'>Source</a> Sustainable SoftwareOk, so the title is Software Engineer or Software Developer, but writing code and building software is only part of the solution. The other half (or more) of the job is designing software solutions for humans to interact with. Software only is useful because we humans use it. Without us, the software is just some meaningless electricity in some far away warehouse.
